Absorb.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Acrobatics.text: Stronger when the user does not have a held item.

After You.text: Gives target priority in the next turn.

AncientPower.text: May raise all user's stats at once.

Aqua Ring.text: Restores a little HP each turn.

Aromatherapy.text: Cures all status problems in your party.

Assist.text: User performs a move known by its allies at random.

Assurance.text: Power doubles if opponent already took damage in the same turn.

Attract.text: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

Autotomize.text: Reduces weight and sharply raises Speed.

Avalanche.text: Power doubles if user took damage first.

Baton Pass.text: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

Beat Up.text: Each Pokémon in user's party attacks.

Belly Drum.text: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

Bestow.text: Gives the user's held item to the target.

Bide.text: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

Bind.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Blaze Kick.text: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

Bounce.text: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

Brick Break.text: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

Brine.text: Power doubles if opponent's HP is less than 50%.

Bug Bite.text: Receives the effect from the opponent's held berry.

Calm Mind.text: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

Camouflage.text: Changes user's type according to the location.

Captivate.text: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack if opposite gender.

Charge.text: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

Circle Throw.text: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Clamp.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Clear Smog.text: Removes all of the target's stat changes.

Close Combat.text: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

Coil.text: Raises user's Attack, Defense and Accuracy.

Constrict.text: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

Conversion 2.text: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

Conversion.text: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

Cosmic Power.text: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

Counter.text: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Covet.text: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

Cross Poison.text: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

Crush Grip.text: More powerful when opponent has higher HP.

Curse.text: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

Dark Void.text: Puts all adjacent opponents to sleep.

Defend Order.text: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

Defog.text: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness and clears fog.

Destiny Bond.text: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

Detect.text: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

Dig.text: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from cave

Disable.text: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

Dive.text: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Dragon Tail.text: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Drain Punch.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Dream Eater.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

Earthquake.text: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

Electro Ball.text: The faster the user, the stronger the attack.

Encore.text: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

Endeavor.text: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

Endure.text: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

Entrainment.text: Makes target's ability same as user's.

Eruption.text: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

Facade.text: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

Fake Out.text: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

False Swipe.text: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

Feint.text: Only hits if opponent uses Protect or Detect in the same turn.

Final Gambit.text: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP. User faints.

Fire Fang.text: May cause flinching and/or burn opponent.

Fire Pledge.text: Added effects appear if combined with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge.

Fire Spin.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Flail.text: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

Flare Blitz.text: User receives recoil damage. May burn opponent.

Flatter.text: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack.

Fly.text: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Focus Punch.text: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

Follow Me.text: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

Foresight.text: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks t

Freeze Shock.text: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

Frost Breath.text: Always results in a critical hit.

Fusion Bolt.text: Power increases if Fusion Flare is used in the same turn.

Fusion Flare.text: Power increases if Fusion Bolt is used in the same turn.

Gastro Acid.text: Cancels out the effect of the opponent's Ability.

Giga Drain.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Grass Knot.text: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

Grass Pledge.text: Added effects appear if preceded by Water Pledge or succeeded by Fire Pledge.

Gravity.text: Prevents moves like Fly and Bounce and the Ability Levitate for 5 turns.

Growth.text: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

Grudge.text: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's las

Guard Split.text: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

Guard Swap.text: User and opponent swap Defense and Special Defense.

Gust.text: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce/Sky Drop with double power.

Gyro Ball.text: The slower the user, the stronger the attack.

Hail.text: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

Heal Bell.text: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

Heal Block.text: Prevents the opponent from restoring HP for 5 turns.

Heal Order.text: User recovers half its max HP.

Heal Pulse.text: Restores half the target's max HP.

Healing Wish.text: The user faints and the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

Heart Swap.text: Stat changes are swapped with the opponent.

Heat Crash.text: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

Heavy Slam.text: The heavier the user, the stronger the attack.

Helping Hand.text: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

Hex.text: Inflicts more damage if the target has a status condition.

Hi Jump Kick.text: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

Hidden Power.text: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

Horn Leech.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Ice Ball.text: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

Ice Burn.text: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May burn opponent.

Ice Fang.text: May cause flinching and/or freeze opponent.

Imprison.text: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

Ingrain.text: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

Judgment.text: Type depends on the Arceus Plate being held.

Jump Kick.text: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

Knock Off.text: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

Last Resort.text: Can only be used after all other moves are used.

Leech Life.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Leech Seed.text: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

Light Screen.text: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

Lock-On.text: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

Low Kick.text: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

Lucky Chant.text: Opponent cannot land critical hits for 5 turns.

Lunar Dance.text: The user faints but the next Pokémon released is fully healed.

Magic Coat.text: Reflects moves that cause status conditions back to the attacker.

Magic Room.text: Suppresses the effects of held items for five turns.

Magma Storm.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Magnet Rise.text: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

Me First.text: User copies the opponent's attack with 1.5× power.

Mega Drain.text: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Memento.text: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

Metal Burst.text: Deals damage equal to 1.5x opponent's attack.

Metronome.text: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

Milk Drink.text: User recovers half its max HP.

Mind Reader.text: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

Miracle Eye.text: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, removes Dark's Psychic immunity.

Mirror Coat.text: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Mirror Move.text: User performs the opponent's last move.

Mist.text: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

Moonlight.text: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Morning Sun.text: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Mud Sport.text: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

Natural Gift.text: Power and type depend on the user's held berry.

Nature Power.text: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

Night Shade.text: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Nightmare.text: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

Odor Sleuth.text: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks to hit Ghosts.

Ominous Wind.text: May raise all user's stats at once.

Outrage.text: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Pain Split.text: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

Pay Day.text: Money is earned after the battle.

Payback.text: Power doubles if the user was attacked first.

Perish Song.text: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

Petal Dance.text: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Pluck.text: If the opponent is holding a berry, its effect is stolen by user.

Poison Tail.text: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

Power Split.text: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

Power Swap.text: User and opponent swap Attack and Special Attack.

Power Trick.text: User's own Attack and Defense switch.

Protect.text: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

Psycho Shift.text: Transfers user's status condition to the opponent.

Psyshock.text: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

Psystrike.text: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

Punishment.text: Power increases when opponent's stats have been raised.

Pursuit.text: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

Quash.text: Makes the target act last this turn.

Quick Guard.text: Protects the user's team from high-priority moves.

Quiver Dance.text: Raises user's Special Attack, Special Defense and Speed.

Rage Powder.text: Forces attacks to hit user, not team-mates.

Rapid Spin.text: Raises user's Speed and removes entry hazards and trap move effects.

Razor Wind.text: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

Recover.text: User recovers half its max HP.

Recycle.text: User's used hold item is restored.

Reflect.text: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

Relic Song.text: May put the target to sleep.

Rest.text: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

Retaliate.text: Inflicts double damage if a teammate fainted on the last turn.

Revenge.text: Power increases if user was hit first.

Reversal.text: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

Roar.text: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Rollout.text: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

Roost.text: User recovers half of its max HP and loses the Flying type temporarily.

Round.text: Power increases if teammates use it in the same turn.

Safeguard.text: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

Sand Tomb.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Secret Power.text: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

Secret Sword.text: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.

Seismic Toss.text: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Shadow Force.text: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

Shell Smash.text: Sharply raises user's Attack, Special Attack and Speed but lowers Defense and Special Defense.

Shift Gear.text: Raises user's Attack and sharply raises Speed.

Silver Wind.text: May raise all stats of user at once.

Sketch.text: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

Skill Swap.text: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

Skull Bash.text: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

Sky Attack.text: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching. High critical hit ratio.

Sky Drop.text: Takes opponent into the air on first turn, drops them on second turn.

Sky Uppercut.text: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

Slack Off.text: User recovers half its max HP.

Sleep Talk.text: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

Smack Down.text: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

Smelling Salts.text: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

Snatch.text: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

Snore.text: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

Soak.text: Changes the target's type to water.

Softboiled.text: User recovers half its max HP.

SolarBeam.text: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

Spit Up.text: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

Spite.text: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

Stockpile.text: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

Stored Power.text: Power increases when user's stats have been raised.

Storm Throw.text: Always results in a critical hit.

Substitute.text: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

Sucker Punch.text: User attacks first, but only works if opponent is readying an attack.

Super Fang.text: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

Swagger.text: Confuses opponent, but sharply raises its Attack.

Swallow.text: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

Switcheroo.text: Swaps held items with the opponent.

Synchronoise.text: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

Synthesis.text: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Taunt.text: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

Techno Blast.text: Type depends on the Drive being held.

Telekinesis.text: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

Teleport.text: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

Thrash.text: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Thunder Fang.text: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

Torment.text: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

Transform.text: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

Tri Attack.text: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

Trick Room.text: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

Trick.text: Swaps held items with the opponent.

Triple Kick.text: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

Trump Card.text: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

Twineedle.text: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

Twister.text: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

U-turn.text: User switches out immediately after attacking.

Uproar.text: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

V-create.text: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

Venoshock.text: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

Vital Throw.text: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

Volt Switch.text: User must switch out after attacking.

Volt Tackle.text: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

Wake-Up Slap.text: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

Water Pledge.text: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

Water Sport.text: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Water Spout.text: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

Weather Ball.text: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

Whirlpool.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Whirlwind.text: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Wide Guard.text: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

Wish.text: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

Wonder Room.text: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

Work Up.text: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

Worry Seed.text: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

Wrap.text: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Wring Out.text: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

Yawn.text: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
